data.current_description: Set driver availability for the provided ride_type in the city/region surrounding the specified location
data.summary_suggestion: Configure driver availability for ride type in sandbox
data.description_suggestion: Configures driver availability for a specific ride type in the sandbox environment at a specified geographic location. This operation allows testing different driver availability scenarios by setting whether drivers are available for the given ride_type. The ride_type path parameter specifies which ride type to configure (e.g., 'lyft', 'lyft_plus'). Requires sandbox credentials and a SandboxDriverAvailability object in the request body specifying availability settings. Returns confirmation of the updated driver availability. This affects all subsequent ride requests for that ride type in the sandbox region.
